doc:
Dion Basco https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dion_Basco 0 Dionysio "Dion" Basco (born January 29, 1977 in Pittsburg, California) is an American film and television actor of Filipino heritage. His brothers Dante, Darion and Derek Basco are also actors. He is best known for his roles as Alberto "Al" Ramos on the NBC Saturday morning sitcom, City Guys and as Flip in the 2003 film, Biker Boyz. Basco also played Marco Quito in the 1996 film Race the Sun, starring Halle Berry. His other credits include Biker Boyz alongside older brother Dante, and The Debut alongside remaining family members Derek, Darion and Arianna. Most recently he was seen on the web series Pretty Dudes alongside Yoshi Sudarso and Beau Sia. Dionysio_"_Dion_"_Basco ( born January_29_,_1977 in Pittsburg , California ) is an_American_film_and_television_actor of Filipino_heritage . His_brothers_Dante_,_Darion_and_Derek_Basco are also actors . He is_best_known for his_roles as Alberto_"_Al_"_Ramos on the_NBC_Saturday_morning_sitcom , City_Guys and as Flip in the_2003_film , Biker_Boyz . Basco also played Marco_Quito in the_1996_film_Race the_Sun , starring Halle_Berry . His_other_credits include Biker_Boyz alongside older_brother_Dante , and The_Debut alongside remaining family_members_Derek_,_Darion_and_Arianna . Most_recently he was_seen on the_web_series_Pretty_Dudes alongside Yoshi_Sudarso and Beau_Sia .
